The breakfast burrito is everything!

Fantastic breakfast burritos
Breakfast taco Tuesday is about to be the best day of your week. Tastes like the gourmet Taco Bell of your dreams.
Come before 11 before everything sells out. They have great baguette sandwiches.
Best bakery in NYC
Everything is phenomenal. Go here and get fat üòÇ
"By far the best bread in NYC" -Action Bronson
It really feels and smells like a french bakery. I‚Äôm a fan for their pain au chocolat.
The Services is outstanding and the beers are from another planet, specially the sours.
The hazy IPAs and sours are great. Love that the brewery is owned by women. Great space and great service!
Female-founded. Gorgeous space. Great beer. What more could you want?
Great sours and great snack!!!

The vibes, and the beers, are incredibly good. Space looked like it popped straight outta AD. But, they either need some sound dampening or I‚Äôm just too old, because it‚Äôs impossible to hear anyone.
You must obviously get their tacos al pastor! Their carne asada is juicy.
Tacos are $3 each after 10PM.
Went up in price
Probably the best taco I've had in NYC.
ooh baby they're spicy
Good but overrated
The hype is real. Burrata pie is the move but everything else was great
Not sure if it was worth the wait but no bad!
Thin crust pizza & ice cream
The fig jam slice with bacon and ricotta is absolutely off the charts, and the burrata is much better than feels like it will be.
A fabulous open aired venue in the middle of Central Park. It‚Äôs a treat to see a show here. Recently renovated.
Check out the free summer festival concerts. There is always something interesting taking place there!
Really, really great outdoor venue for concerts. Does it get better than Central Park?! Not really!
Backstreet Boys
Nice venue makes you forget you are in the middle of a large city.
Phenomenal tacos. Campechano, Al pastor, and nopales with chicaron are the winners.
Can confirm these are tacos and they are very good.
i‚Äôm sure the meat options are delicious but for us vegetarians there‚Äôs just the nopales taco which is just okay üò≠ no fish option either
Al Pastor & Napoles are incredibly flavorful. Go on a week day to avoid the crowds. Efficient and friendly service.
pastor was best. the tacos probably look a bit better than they are. Happens
Ristorante tailandese con concetto Diner americano. Locale molto suggestivo e ottimo cibo, buon servizio e prezzi alti ma le porzioni sono abbondanti. Unico neo la cucina chiude alle 22.
I recently dined at a Thai diner in my neighborhood, and I must say it was an outstanding experience. From the moment I stepped in, I was greeted warmly by the staff, who were incredibly friendly
Wonderful Thai food. My favorite is pad Thai üôåüèª.recommend
The breakfast sandwiches and anything ‚Äúfrom the wok‚Äù are delicious!
All the best of uncle boons menu in a super funky and fun atmosphere, love this place
The Yum Nuer was excellent. Also make sure to start and finish off with some excellent drinks from the bartender.
Really enjoyed my meal! Restaurant packed up right at 5pm, be sure to get a rev. Loved the duck noodles and mango sticky rice!
Pretty good food - I liked the dumplings & my duck noodles. The service could have been better, given this is a Michelin star restaurant
Went with two others and we all loved everything we ate, with the Koong Karee as the table favorite. Eggplant salad was surprising and delicious.
Compare Soothr to Ayada in Chelsea Market (combines a comfortable, upscale interior and warm service with top shelf cooking.) Soft shell crab khao soi is among the best I've ever eaten.
Soft serve and good cappuccino too!
It took me a long time to decide what I wanted. Turns out anything I would have picked would have been incredibly good. You get extra toppings for free be sure to ask
Insanely good ice cream. The texture of the vanilla was pillowy like a marshmallow while being creamy at the same time. So good.
Recommended by @foodiemagician on Instagram .
Red flag was delicious and make sure to get your ice cream with panna on top!
